section.name: Self Testing
section.p:
In general the best way to self test is to start off at your {context name}/admin/index.jsp which will ask for a tomcat manager username and password. See "installation" documentation on info about setting up tomcat manager users.
Now you are ready to begin adding accounts, groups, members, and permissions. As you add accounts it should also add to VOSpace/Myspace the account if the community is setup to have a Myspace which is normally done.
